Function reference

Package documentation

scoringutils scoringutils-package
scoringutils: Utilities for Scoring and Assessing Predictions

Functions to analyse inputs and obtain useful information

as_forecast()
Create a forecast Object
get_duplicate_forecasts()
Find duplicate forecasts
get_forecast_counts()
Count Number of Available Forecasts
get_forecast_type()
Infer Forecast Type
get_forecast_unit()
Get unit of a single forecast
log_shift()
Log transformation with an additive shift
print(<scoringutils_check>)
Print output from check_forecasts()
transform_forecasts()
Transform forecasts and observed values
validate_forecast()
Validate input data

Functions for convenient forecast evaluation

score()
Evaluate forecasts in a data.frame format
add_coverage()
Add Coverage Values to Quantile-Based Forecasts
add_pairwise_comparison()
Add pairwise comparisons
correlation()
Correlation Between Metrics
pairwise_comparison()
Do Pairwise Comparisons of Scores
pit()
Probability Integral Transformation (data.frame Format)
run_safely()
Run a function safely
summarise_scores() summarize_scores()
Summarise scores as produced by score()

Lower-level scoring functions

ae_median_quantile()
Absolute Error of the Median (Quantile-based Version)
ae_median_sample()
Absolute Error of the Median (Sample-based Version)
bias_quantile()
Determines Bias of Quantile Forecasts
bias_sample()
Determines bias of forecasts
crps_sample()
Ranked Probability Score
dss_sample()
Dawid-Sebastiani Score
interval_coverage()
Interval Coverage (For Quantile-Based Forecasts)
interval_coverage_deviation()
Interval Coverage Deviation (For Quantile-Based Forecasts)
interval_score()
Interval Score
logs_sample()
Logarithmic score
mad_sample()
Determine dispersion of a probabilistic forecast
pit_sample()
Probability Integral Transformation (sample-based version)
quantile_score()
Quantile Score
rules_binary()
Scoring Rules for Binary Forecasts
rules_point()
Scoring Rules for Point Forecasts
rules_quantile()
Scoring Rules for Quantile-Based Forecasts
rules_sample()
Scoring Rules for Sample-Based Forecasts
brier_score() logs_binary()
Metrics for Binary Outcomes
se_mean_sample()
Squared Error of the Mean (Sample-based Version)
select_rules()
Select Scoring Rules From A List of Possible Scoring Rules
wis() dispersion() overprediction() underprediction()
Weighted Interval Score (WIS)

Data wrangling helpers

merge_pred_and_obs()
Merge Forecast Data And Observations
quantile_to_interval()
Transform From a Quantile Format to an Interval Format
sample_to_quantile()
Change Data from a Sample Based Format to a Quantile Format
set_forecast_unit()
Set unit of a single forecast manually

theme_scoringutils()

Internal input check functions

Assert Inputs Have Matching Dimensions

Check Length of Two Vectors is Equal
assert_input_binary()
Assert that inputs are correct for binary forecast
assert_input_interval()
Assert that inputs are correct for interval-based forecast
assert_input_point()
Assert that inputs are correct for point forecast
assert_input_quantile()
Assert that inputs are correct for quantile-based forecast
assert_input_sample()
Assert that inputs are correct for sample-based forecast

Check Variable is not NULL
assure_model_column()
Assure that Data Has a model Column
check_attribute_conflict()
Check Whether There Is a Conflict Between Data and Attributes
check_columns_present()
Check column names are present in a data.frame
check_data_columns()
Check whether data is data.frame with correct columns
check_dims_ok_point()
Check Inputs Have Matching Dimensions
check_duplicates()
Check that there are no duplicate forecasts
check_has_attribute()
Check whether an attribute is present
check_input_binary()
Check that inputs are correct for binary forecast
check_input_interval()
Check that inputs are correct for interval-based forecast
check_input_point()
Check that inputs are correct for point forecast
check_input_quantile()
Check that inputs are correct for quantile-based forecast
check_input_sample()
Check that inputs are correct for sample-based forecast
check_no_NA_present()
Check columns in data.frame don't have NA values
check_number_per_forecast()
Check that all forecasts have the same number of quantiles or samples
check_numeric_vector()
Check whether an input is an atomic vector of mode 'numeric'
check_quantiles()
Check that quantiles are valid
check_try()
Helper function to convert assert statements into checks
get_metrics()
Get metrics that were used for scoring
get_type()
Get type of a vector or matrix of observed values or predictions
test_columns_not_present()
Test whether column names are NOT present in a data.frame
test_columns_present()
Test whether all column names are present in a data.frame
test_forecast_type_is_binary()
Test whether data could be a binary forecast.
test_forecast_type_is_point()
Test whether data could be a point forecast.
test_forecast_type_is_quantile()
Test whether data could be a quantile forecast.
test_forecast_type_is_sample()
Test whether data could be a sample-based forecast.
validate_general()
Apply scoringutls input checks that are the same across forecast types
validate_metrics()
Validate metrics
